pli-tv-pvr5:5.2: Lobho pubbaṅgamo, doso pubbaṅgamo, moho pubbaṅgamo, alobho pubbaṅgamo, adoso pubbaṅgamo, amoho pubbaṅgamo.
pli-tv-pvr5:5.11: tayo kusalahetū, tayo akusalahetū, tayo abyākatahetū.
pli-tv-pvr5:6.2: Lobho pubbaṅgamo, doso pubbaṅgamo, moho pubbaṅgamo, alobho pubbaṅgamo, adoso pubbaṅgamo, amoho pubbaṅgamo.
pli-tv-pvr5:6.11: tayo kusalahetū, tayo akusalahetū, tayo abyākatahetū.
pli-tv-pvr5:6.19: sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:7.2: Lobho pubbaṅgamo, doso pubbaṅgamo, moho pubbaṅgamo, alobho pubbaṅgamo, adoso pubbaṅgamo, amoho pubbaṅgamo.
pli-tv-pvr5:7.16: alajjitā, aññāṇatā, kukkuccapakatatā, akappiye kappiyasaññitā, kappiye akappiyasaññitā, satisammosā.
pli-tv-pvr5:7.19: sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:8.2: Lobho pubbaṅgamo, doso pubbaṅgamo, moho pubbaṅgamo, alobho pubbaṅgamo, adoso pubbaṅgamo, amoho pubbaṅgamo.
pli-tv-pvr5:8.11: tayo kusalahetū, tayo akusalahetū, tayo abyākatahetū.
pli-tv-pvr5:9.3: Sammukhāvinayo, sativinayo, amūḷhavinayo, paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ, yebhuyyasikā, tassapāpiyasikā, tiṇavatthārako—
pli-tv-pvr5:10.1: Siyā ime satta samathā dasa samathā honti, dasa samathā satta samathā honti vatthuvasena pariyāyena?
pli-tv-pvr5:11.2: Vivādādhikaraṇassa dve samathā, anuvādādhikaraṇassa cattāro samathā, āpattādhikaraṇassa tayo samathā, kiccādhikaraṇassa eko samatho.
pli-tv-pvr5:11.3: Evaṁ ime satta samathā dasa samathā honti, dasa samathā satta samathā honti vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
pli-tv-pvr5:17.4: yebhuyyasikā, sativinayo, amūḷhavinayo, paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ, tassapāpiyasikā, tiṇavatthārako.
pli-tv-pvr5:23.4: yebhuyyasikā, sativinayo, amūḷhavinayo, paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ, tassapāpiyasikā, tiṇavatthārako.
pli-tv-pvr5:25.1: Samathā samathassa sādhāraṇā, samathā samathassa asādhāraṇā.
pli-tv-pvr5:25.2: Siyā samathā samathassa sādhāraṇā, siyā samathā samathassa asādhāraṇā.
pli-tv-pvr5:26.3: Yebhuyyasikā sammukhāvinayassa sādhāraṇā, sativinayassa amūḷhavinayassa paṭiññātakaraṇassa tassapāpiyasikāya tiṇavatthārakassa asādhāraṇā.
pli-tv-pvr5:27.1: Sativinayo sammukhāvinayassa sādhāraṇo, amūḷhavinayassa paṭiññātakaraṇassa tassapāpiyasikāya tiṇavatthārakassa yebhuyyasikāya asādhāraṇo.
pli-tv-pvr5:28.1: Amūḷhavinayo sammukhāvinayassa sādhāraṇo, paṭiññātakaraṇassa tassapāpiyasikāya tiṇavatthārakassa yebhuyyasikāya sativinayassa asādhāraṇo.
pli-tv-pvr5:29.1: Paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ sammukhāvinayassa sādhāraṇaṁ, tassapāpiyasikāya tiṇavatthārakassa yebhuyyasikāya sativinayassa amūḷhavinayassa asādhāraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr5:30.1: Tassapāpiyasikā sammukhāvinayassa sādhāraṇā, tiṇavatthārakassa yebhuyyasikāya sativinayassa amūḷhavinayassa paṭiññātakaraṇassa asādhāraṇā.
pli-tv-pvr5:31.1: Tiṇavatthārako sammukhāvinayassa sādhāraṇo, yebhuyyasikāya sativinayassa amūḷhavinayassa paṭiññātakaraṇassa tassapāpiyasikāya asādhāraṇo.
pli-tv-pvr5:34.1: Samathā samathassa tabbhāgiyā, samathā samathassa aññabhāgiyā.
pli-tv-pvr5:34.2: Siyā samathā samathassa tabbhāgiyā, siyā samathā samathassa aññabhāgiyā.
pli-tv-pvr5:35.3: Yebhuyyasikā sammukhāvinayassa tabbhāgiyā, sativinayassa amūḷhavinayassa paṭiññātakaraṇassa tassapāpiyasikāya tiṇavatthārakassa aññabhāgiyā.
pli-tv-pvr5:36.1: Sativinayo sammukhāvinayassa tabbhāgiyo, amūḷhavinayassa paṭiññātakaraṇassa tassapāpiyasikāya tiṇavatthārakassa yebhuyyasikāya aññabhāgiyo.
pli-tv-pvr5:37.1: Amūḷhavinayo sammukhāvinayassa tabbhāgiyo, paṭiññātakaraṇassa tassapāpiyasikāya tiṇavatthārakassa yebhuyyasikāya sativinayassa aññabhāgiyo.
pli-tv-pvr5:38.1: Paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ sammukhāvinayassa tabbhāgiyaṁ, tassapāpiyasikāya tiṇavatthārakassa yebhuyyasikāya sativinayassa amūḷhavinayassa aññabhāgiyaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr5:39.1: Tassapāpiyasikā sammukhāvinayassa tabbhāgiyā, tiṇavatthārakassa yebhuyyasikāya sativinayassa amūḷhavinayassa paṭiññātakaraṇassa aññabhāgiyā.
pli-tv-pvr5:40.1: Tiṇavatthārako sammukhāvinayassa tabbhāgiyo, yebhuyyasikāya sativinayassa amūḷhavinayassa paṭiññātakaraṇassa tassapāpiyasikāya aññabhāgiyo.
pli-tv-pvr5:41.1: Evaṁ siyā samathā samathassa tabbhāgiyā, evaṁ siyā samathā samathassa aññabhāgiyā.
pli-tv-pvr5:44.1: Yebhuyyasikā sativinayo amūḷhavinayo paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ tassapāpiyasikā tiṇavatthārako—
pli-tv-pvr5:45.1: Sativinayo amūḷhavinayo paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ tassapāpiyasikā tiṇavatthārako sammukhāvinayo—
pli-tv-pvr5:46.1: Amūḷhavinayo paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ tassapāpiyasikā tiṇavatthārako sammukhāvinayo yebhuyyasikā—
pli-tv-pvr5:47.1: Paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ tassapāpiyasikā tiṇavatthārako sammukhāvinayo yebhuyyasikā sativinayo—
pli-tv-pvr5:48.1: Tassapāpiyasikā tiṇavatthārako sammukhāvinayo yebhuyyasikā sativinayo amūḷhavinayo—
pli-tv-pvr5:49.1: Tiṇavatthārako sammukhāvinayo yebhuyyasikā sativinayo amūḷhavinayo paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ—
pli-tv-pvr5:50.1: Sammukhāvinayo yebhuyyasikā sativinayo amūḷhavinayo paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ tassapāpiyasikā—
pli-tv-pvr5:53.1: Vinayo siyā sammukhāvinayo siyā na sammukhāvinayo.
pli-tv-pvr5:54.1: Vinayo siyā yebhuyyasikā, siyā na yebhuyyasikā.
pli-tv-pvr5:55.1: Vinayo siyā sativinayo, siyā na sativinayo.
pli-tv-pvr5:56.1: Vinayo siyā amūḷhavinayo, siyā na amūḷhavinayo.
pli-tv-pvr5:57.1: Vinayo siyā paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ, siyā na paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr5:58.1: Vinayo siyā tassapāpiyasikā, siyā na tassapāpiyasikā.
pli-tv-pvr5:59.1: Vinayo siyā tiṇavatthārako, siyā na tiṇavatthārako.
pli-tv-pvr5:63.1: Yebhuyyasikā siyā kusalā, siyā akusalā, siyā abyākatā.
pli-tv-pvr5:64.1: Sativinayo siyā kusalo, siyā akusalo, siyā abyākato.
pli-tv-pvr5:65.1: Amūḷhavinayo siyā kusalo, siyā akusalo, siyā abyākato.
pli-tv-pvr5:66.1: Paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ siyā kusalaṁ, siyā akusalaṁ, siyā abyākataṁ.
pli-tv-pvr5:67.1: Tassapāpiyasikā siyā kusalā, siyā akusalā siyā abyākatā.
pli-tv-pvr5:68.1: Tiṇavatthārako siyā kusalo, siyā akusalo, siyā abyākato.
pli-tv-pvr5:70.1: Vivādādhikaraṇaṁ siyā kusalaṁ, siyā akusalaṁ, siyā abyākataṁ.
pli-tv-pvr5:71.1: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ siyā kusalaṁ, siyā akusalaṁ, siyā abyākataṁ.
pli-tv-pvr5:73.1: Kiccādhikaraṇaṁ siyā kusalaṁ, siyā akusalaṁ, siyā abyākataṁ.
pli-tv-pvr5:75.1: Yattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati;
pli-tv-pvr5:75.2: yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:75.3: Na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ labbhati, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:76.1: Yattha sativinayo labbhati, tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati;
pli-tv-pvr5:76.2: yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, tattha sativinayo labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:76.3: Na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ labbhati, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:77.1: Yattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati;
pli-tv-pvr5:77.2: yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:77.3: Na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ labbhati, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:78.1: Yattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ labbhati, tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati;
pli-tv-pvr5:78.2: yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:78.3: Na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:79.1: Yattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati;
pli-tv-pvr5:79.2: yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:79.3: Na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:80.1: Yattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati;
pli-tv-pvr5:80.2: yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:80.3: Na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ labbhati, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:81.3: Na tattha sativinayo, na tattha amūḷhavinayo, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā, na tattha tiṇavatthārako.
pli-tv-pvr5:82.3: Na tattha amūḷhavinayo, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā, na tattha tiṇavatthārako, na tattha yebhuyyasikā.
pli-tv-pvr5:83.3: Na tattha yebhuyyasikā, na tattha sativinayo, na tattha amūḷhavinayo, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā.
pli-tv-pvr5:85.1: Yasmiṁ samaye sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasammati, yattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:85.2: Na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ labbhati, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:86.1: Yasmiṁ samaye sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasammati, yattha sativinayo labbhati tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati tattha sativinayo labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:86.2: Na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ labbhati, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:87.1: Yasmiṁ samaye sammukhāvinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasammati, yattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:87.2: Na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ labbhati, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:88.1: Yasmiṁ samaye sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasammati, yattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ labbhati tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:88.2: Na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati.

pli-tv-pvr5:89.2: Na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ labbhati.

pli-tv-pvr5:90.2: Na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ labbhati, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:92.1: Adhikaraṇanti vā samathāti vā ime dhammā saṁsaṭṭhā udāhu visaṁsaṭṭhā?
pli-tv-pvr5:92.2: Labbhā ca panimesaṁ dhammānaṁ vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvā nānākaraṇaṁ paññāpetunti?
pli-tv-pvr5:93.1: Adhikaraṇanti vā samathāti vā ime dhammā visaṁsaṭṭhā, no saṁsaṭṭhā.
pli-tv-pvr5:93.2: Labbhā ca panimesaṁ dhammānaṁ vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvā nānākaraṇaṁ paññāpetunti.
pli-tv-pvr5:93.4: Adhikaraṇanti vā samathāti vā ime dhammā saṁsaṭṭhā, no visaṁsaṭṭhā.
pli-tv-pvr5:93.5: No ca labbhā imesaṁ dhammānaṁ vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvā nānākaraṇaṁ paññāpetuṁ.
pli-tv-pvr5:93.9: Adhikaraṇā samathehi sammanti, samathā adhikaraṇehi sammanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:93.10: Evaṁ, ime dhammā saṁsaṭṭhā no visaṁsaṭṭhā;
pli-tv-pvr5:93.11: no ca labbhā imesaṁ dhammānaṁ vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvā nānākaraṇaṁ paññāpetun”ti.

pli-tv-pvr5:106.1: Vivādādhikaraṇañca anuvādādhikaraṇañca āpattādhikaraṇañca katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr5:106.2: Vivādādhikaraṇañca anuvādādhikaraṇañca āpattādhikaraṇañca sattahi samathehi sammanti—
pli-tv-pvr5:106.3: sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:107.1: Vivādādhikaraṇañca anuvādādhikaraṇañca kiccādhikaraṇañca katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr5:107.2: Vivādādhikaraṇañca anuvādādhikaraṇañca kiccādhikaraṇañca pañcahi samathehi sammanti—
pli-tv-pvr5:107.3: sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:108.1: Anuvādādhikaraṇañca āpattādhikaraṇañca kiccādhikaraṇañca katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr5:108.2: Anuvādādhikaraṇañca āpattādhikaraṇañca kiccādhikaraṇañca chahi samathehi sammanti—

pli-tv-pvr5:109.1: Vivādādhikaraṇañca anuvādādhikaraṇañca āpattādhikaraṇañca kiccādhikaraṇañca katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr5:109.2: Vivādādhikaraṇañca anuvādādhikaraṇañca āpattādhikaraṇañca kiccādhikaraṇañca sattahi samathehi sammanti—
pli-tv-pvr5:109.3: sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.

pli-tv-pvr5:111.2: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ katihi samathehi sammati, katihi samathehi na sammati?
pli-tv-pvr5:111.3: Āpattādhikaraṇaṁ katihi samathehi sammati, katihi samathehi na sammati?
pli-tv-pvr5:111.4: Kiccādhikaraṇaṁ katihi samathehi sammati, katihi samathehi na sammati?
pli-tv-pvr5:112.4: sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:113.2: sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:113.4: yebhuyyasikāya ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:114.2: sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:114.4: yebhuyyasikāya ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:115.4: yebhuyyasikāya ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:116.4: sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:117.4: sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:117.6: sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:118.6: sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:119.4: sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:120.4: sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:120.6: yebhuyyasikāya ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:121.4: sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:121.6: yebhuyyasikāya ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:122.1: Vivādādhikaraṇañca anuvādādhikaraṇañca āpattādhikaraṇañca katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr5:124.3: Anuvādādhikaraṇañca āpattādhikaraṇañca kiccādhikaraṇañca chahi samathehi sammanti—
pli-tv-pvr5:124.4: sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:125.1: Vivādādhikaraṇañca anuvādādhikaraṇañca āpattādhikaraṇañca kiccādhikaraṇañca katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr5:125.3: Vivādādhikaraṇañca anuvādādhikaraṇañca āpattādhikaraṇañca kiccādhikaraṇañca sattahi samathehi sammanti—
pli-tv-pvr5:125.4: sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:128.1: Siyā samathā samathehi sammanti, siyā samathā samathehi na sammanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:128.2: Siyā samathā adhikaraṇehi sammanti, siyā samathā adhikaraṇehi na sammanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:128.3: Siyā adhikaraṇā samathehi sammanti, siyā adhikaraṇā samathehi na sammanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:128.4: Siyā adhikaraṇā adhikaraṇehi sammanti, siyā adhikaraṇā adhikaraṇehi na sammanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:129.1: Kathaṁ siyā samathā samathehi sammanti, kathaṁ siyā samathā samathehi na sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr5:129.3: sativinayena na sammati, amūḷhavinayena na sammati, paṭiññātakaraṇena na sammati, tassapāpiyasikāya na sammati, tiṇavatthārakena na sammati.
pli-tv-pvr5:130.2: amūḷhavinayena na sammati, paṭiññātakaraṇena na sammāti, tassapāpiyasikāya na sammati, tiṇavatthārakena na sammati, yebhuyyasikāya na sammati.
pli-tv-pvr5:131.2: paṭiññātakaraṇena na sammati, tassapāpiyasikāya na sammati, tiṇavatthārakena na sammati, yebhuyyasikāya na sammati, sativinayena na sammati.
pli-tv-pvr5:132.2: tassapāpiyasikāya na sammati, tiṇavatthārakena na sammati, yebhuyyasikāya na sammati, sativinayena na sammati, amūḷhavinayena na sammati.
pli-tv-pvr5:133.2: tiṇavatthārakena na sammati, yebhuyyasikāya na sammati, sativinayena na sammati, amūḷhavinayena na sammati, paṭiññātakaraṇena na sammati.
pli-tv-pvr5:134.2: yebhuyyasikāya na sammati, sativinayena na sammati, amūḷhavinayena na sammati, paṭiññātakaraṇena na sammati, tassapāpiyasikāya na sammati.
pli-tv-pvr5:134.4: Evaṁ siyā samathā samathehi na sammanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:135.1: Kathaṁ siyā samathā adhikaraṇehi sammanti, kathaṁ siyā samathā adhikaraṇehi na sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr5:135.2: Sammukhāvinayo vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:136.1: Yebhuyyasikā vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:137.1: Sativinayo vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:138.1: Amūḷhavinayo vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:139.1: Paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:140.1: Tassapāpiyasikā vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:141.1: Tiṇavatthārako vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:141.4: Evaṁ siyā samathā adhikaraṇehi na sammanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:142.1: Kathaṁ siyā adhikaraṇā samathehi sammanti, kathaṁ siyā adhikaraṇā samathehi na sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr5:142.2: Vivādādhikaraṇaṁ sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:142.3: sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca tiṇavatthārakena ca na sammati.
pli-tv-pvr5:143.1: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:143.2: yebhuyyasikāya ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca na sammati.
pli-tv-pvr5:144.1: Āpattādhikaraṇaṁ sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:144.2: yebhuyyasikāya ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca na sammati.
pli-tv-pvr5:145.2: yebhuyyasikāya ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca tiṇavatthārakena ca na sammati.
pli-tv-pvr5:145.4: Evaṁ siyā adhikaraṇā samathehi na sammanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:146.1: Kathaṁ siyā adhikaraṇā adhikaraṇehi sammanti? Kathaṁ siyā adhikaraṇā adhikaraṇehi na sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr5:146.2: Vivādādhikaraṇaṁ vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:147.1: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:148.1: Āpattādhikaraṇaṁ vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:149.1: Kiccādhikaraṇaṁ vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:149.4: Evaṁ siyā adhikaraṇā adhikaraṇehi na sammanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:150.1: Chāpi samathā cattāropi adhikaraṇā sammukhāvinayena sammanti;
pli-tv-pvr5:152.1: Vivādādhikaraṇaṁ catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ samuṭṭhāpeti?
pli-tv-pvr5:152.2: Vivādādhikaraṇaṁ catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ na katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ samuṭṭhāpeti;
pli-tv-pvr5:152.3: api ca vivādādhikaraṇapaccayā cattāro adhikaraṇā jāyanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:152.6: “dhammo”ti vā, “adhammo”ti vā, “vinayo”ti vā, “avinayo”ti vā, “abhāsitaṁ alapitaṁ tathāgatenā”ti vā, “bhāsitaṁ lapitaṁ tathāgatenā”ti vā, “anāciṇṇaṁ tathāgatenā”ti vā, “āciṇṇaṁ tathāgatenā”ti vā, “apaññattaṁ tathāgatenā”ti vā, “paññattaṁ tathāgatenā”ti vā, “āpattī”ti vā, “anāpattī”ti vā, “lahukā āpattī”ti vā, “garukā āpattī”ti vā, “sāvasesā āpattī”ti vā, “anavasesā āpattī”ti vā, “duṭṭhullā āpattī”ti vā “aduṭṭhullā āpattī”ti vā.
pli-tv-pvr5:152.7: Yaṁ tattha bhaṇḍanaṁ kalaho viggaho vivādo nānāvādo aññathāvādo vipaccatāya vohāro medhakaṁ, idaṁ vuccati vivādādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr5:152.11: Tāya āpattiyā saṅgho kammaṁ karoti kiccādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr5:153.1: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ samuṭṭhāpeti?
pli-tv-pvr5:153.2: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ na katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ samuṭṭhāpeti;
pli-tv-pvr5:153.3: api ca anuvādādhikaraṇapaccayā cattāro adhikaraṇā jāyanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:153.5: Idha bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ anuvadanti sīlavipattiyā vā ācāravipattiyā vā diṭṭhivipattiyā vā ājīvavipattiyā vā.
pli-tv-pvr5:153.6: Yo tattha anuvādo anuvadanā anullapanā anubhaṇanā anusampavaṅkatā abbhussahanatā anubalappadānaṁ, idaṁ vuccati anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr5:153.10: Tāya āpattiyā saṅgho kammaṁ karoti kiccādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr5:154.1: Āpattādhikaraṇaṁ catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ samuṭṭhāpeti?
pli-tv-pvr5:154.2: Āpattādhikaraṇaṁ catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ na katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ samuṭṭhāpeti;
pli-tv-pvr5:154.3: api ca āpattādhikaraṇapaccayā cattāro adhikaraṇā jāyanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:154.5: Pañcapi āpattikkhandhā āpattādhikaraṇaṁ, sattapi āpattikkhandhā āpattādhikaraṇaṁ, idaṁ vuccati āpattādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr5:154.9: Tāya āpattiyā saṅgho kammaṁ karoti kiccādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr5:155.1: Kiccādhikaraṇaṁ catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ samuṭṭhāpeti?
pli-tv-pvr5:155.2: Kiccādhikaraṇaṁ catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ na katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ samuṭṭhāpeti,
pli-tv-pvr5:155.3: api ca kiccādhikaraṇapaccayā cattāro adhikaraṇā jāyanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:155.5: Yā saṅghassa kiccayatā karaṇīyatā apalokanakammaṁ ñattikammaṁ ñattidutiyakammaṁ ñatticatutthakammaṁ, idaṁ vuccati kiccādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr5:155.9: Tāya āpattiyā saṅgho kammaṁ karoti kiccādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr5:157.1: Vivādādhikaraṇaṁ catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ bhajati?
pli-tv-pvr5:158.1: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ bhajati?
pli-tv-pvr5:159.1: Āpattādhikaraṇaṁ catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ bhajati?
pli-tv-pvr5:160.1: Kiccādhikaraṇaṁ catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ bhajati?
pli-tv-pvr5:161.1: Vivādādhikaraṇaṁ catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ vivādādhikaraṇaṁ bhajati, vivādādhikaraṇaṁ upanissitaṁ, vivādādhikaraṇaṁ pariyāpannaṁ, vivādādhikaraṇena saṅgahitaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr5:162.1: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ bhajati, anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ upanissitaṁ, anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ pariyāpannaṁ, anuvādādhikaraṇena saṅgahitaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr5:163.1: Āpattādhikaraṇaṁ catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ āpattādhikaraṇaṁ bhajati, āpattādhikaraṇaṁ upanissitaṁ, āpattādhikaraṇaṁ pariyāpannaṁ, āpattādhikaraṇena saṅgahitaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr5:164.1: Kiccādhikaraṇaṁ catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ kiccādhikaraṇaṁ bhajati, kiccādhikaraṇaṁ upanissitaṁ, kiccādhikaraṇaṁ pariyāpannaṁ, kiccādhikaraṇena saṅgahitaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr5:165.1: Vivādādhikaraṇaṁ sattannaṁ samathānaṁ kati samathe bhajati, kati samathe upanissitaṁ, kati samathe pariyāpannaṁ, katihi samathehi saṅgahitaṁ, katihi samathehi sammati?
pli-tv-pvr5:166.1: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ sattannaṁ samathānaṁ kati samathe bhajati, kati samathe upanissitaṁ, kati samathe pariyāpannaṁ, katihi samathehi saṅgahitaṁ, katihi samathehi sammati?
pli-tv-pvr5:167.1: Āpattādhikaraṇaṁ sattannaṁ samathānaṁ kati samathe bhajati, kati samathe upanissitaṁ, kati samathe pariyāpannaṁ, katihi samathehi saṅgahitaṁ, katihi samathehi sammati?
pli-tv-pvr5:168.1: Kiccādhikaraṇaṁ sattannaṁ samathānaṁ kati samathe bhajati, kati samathe upanissitaṁ, kati samathe pariyāpannaṁ, katihi samathehi saṅgahitaṁ, katihi samathehi sammati?
pli-tv-pvr5:169.1: Vivādādhikaraṇaṁ sattannaṁ samathānaṁ dve samathe bhajati, dve samathe upanissitaṁ, dve samathe pariyāpannaṁ, dvīhi samathehi saṅgahitaṁ, dvīhi samathehi sammati—
pli-tv-pvr5:170.1: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ sattannaṁ samathānaṁ cattāro samathe bhajati, cattāro samathe upanissitaṁ, cattāro samathe pariyāpannaṁ, catūhi samathehi saṅgahitaṁ, catūhi samathehi sammati—
pli-tv-pvr5:170.2: sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:171.1: Āpattādhikaraṇaṁ sattannaṁ samathānaṁ tayo samathe bhajati, tayo samathe upanissitaṁ, tayo samathe pariyāpannaṁ, tīhi samathehi saṅgahitaṁ tīhi samathehi sammati—
pli-tv-pvr5:171.2: sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:172.1: Kiccādhikaraṇaṁ sattannaṁ samathānaṁ ekaṁ samathaṁ bhajati, ekaṁ samathaṁ upanissitaṁ, ekaṁ samathaṁ pariyāpannaṁ, ekena samathena saṅgahitaṁ, ekena samathena sammati—
